definitions.definition: A baked food item made from flour and fat pastes such as pie crust; also tarts, bear claws, napoleons, puff pastries, etc.
definitions.example: That pastry shop sells not just pastries, but all kinds of baked goods.

definitions.definition: The food group formed by the various kinds of pastries.
definitions.example: That pastry shop sells not just pastry, but all kinds of baked goods.

definitions.definition: The type of light flour-based dough used in pastries.
A place where pastry is made.
The act or art of making pastry.
definitions.example: He learned pastry from the great Gaston Lenôtre.
